mapper.insert: insert into bi_filebrowse_rule_master (guid, RULENAME, conditionguid, conditionname, valueguid, valuename, mastervalueguid, mastervaluename, parentguid, position, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid) VALUES( #GUID#, #RULENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CONDITIONGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CONDITIONNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #VALUEGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #VALUENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MASTERVALUEGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MASTERVALUENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #PARENTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #POSITION#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#)
mapper.update:
UPDATE bi_filebrowse_rule_master
updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, RULENAME=#RULENAME#, conditionguid=#CONDITIONGUID#, conditionname=#CONDITIONNAME#, valueguid=#VALUEGUID#, valuename=#VALUENAME#, mastervalueguid=#MASTERVALUEGUID#, mastervaluename=#MASTERVALUENAME#, parentguid=#PARENTGUID#, position=#POSITION#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM bi_filebrowse_rule_master a WHERE a.guid=#guid#
